section.title: Attaching an Existing ISO domain to a Data Center
section.para: An ISO domain that is Unattached can be attached to a data center. The ISO domain must be of the same Storage Type as the data center.
Only one ISO domain can be attached to a data center.

procedure.title: Attaching an Existing ISO Domain to a Data Center

step.para: Click the Data Centers resource tab and select the appropriate data center.
Select the Storage tab in the details pane to list the storage domains already attached to the data center.
Click Attach ISO to open the Attach ISO Library window.
Click the radio button for the appropriate ISO domain.

section.para: The ISO domain is attached to the data center and is automatically activated.
